analysis.description:
bitbgcToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/45/0x4ccc99bc93c5c5b4d7f574d6d59ee3783831988a.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/45/0x4ccc99bc93c5c5b4d7f574d6d59ee3783831988a.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/45/0x4ccc99bc93c5c5b4d7f574d6d59ee3783831988a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/45/0x4ccc99bc93c5c5b4d7f574d6d59ee3783831988a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/45/0x4ccc99bc93c5c5b4d7f574d6d59ee3783831988a.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
